A Psalm<S>4210</S>. O sing<S>7891</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> a new<S>2319</S> song<S>7892</S>; for he hath done<S>6213</S> marvellous things<S>6381</S>: his right hand<S>3225</S>, and his holy<S>6944</S> arm<S>2220</S>, hath gotten him the victory<S>3467</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> hath made known<S>3045</S> his salvation<S>3444</S>: his righteousness<S>6666</S> hath he openly shewed<S>1540</S> in the sight<S>5869</S> of the heathen<S>1471</S>. <sup>openly: or, revealed</sup>
He hath remembered<S>2142</S> his mercy<S>2617</S> and his truth<S>530</S> toward the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: all the ends<S>657</S> of the earth<S>776</S> have seen<S>7200</S> the salvation<S>3444</S> of our God<S>430</S>.
Make a joyful noise<S>7321</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, all the earth<S>776</S>: make a loud noise<S>6476</S>, and rejoice<S>7442</S>, and sing<S>2167</S> praise.
Sing<S>2167</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> with the harp<S>3658</S>; with the harp<S>3658</S>, and the voice<S>6963</S> of a psalm<S>2172</S>.
With trumpets<S>2689</S> and sound<S>6963</S> of cornet<S>7782</S> make a joyful noise<S>7321</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, the King<S>4428</S>.
Let the sea<S>3220</S> roar<S>7481</S>, and the fulness<S>4393</S> thereof; the world<S>8398</S>, and they that dwell<S>3427</S> therein. <sup>the fulness: or, all it containeth</sup>
Let the floods<S>5104</S> clap<S>4222</S> their hands<S>3709</S>: let the hills<S>2022</S> be joyful<S>7442</S> together<S>3162</S>
Before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; for he cometh<S>935</S> to judge<S>8199</S> the earth<S>776</S>: with righteousness<S>6664</S> shall he judge<S>8199</S> the world<S>8398</S>, and the people<S>5971</S> with equity<S>4339</S>.
